Articles.Content: My main save isn't working. It says "just started" instead of normal info. Steam says 14 files don't verify when I check the integrity of game files. None of my files will open. Any way to fix this? I've tried restarting the game and my computer and nothing works.

3 hours ago, KingDominoIII said:

Steam says 14 files don't verify when I check the integrity of game files

Does it happens multiple times, like after every game start? And even though this is the unmodded support forum: Do you run any mods on any KSP install and if so, do you use any mod manager?

I'm a bit confused about the save file though. Maybe an issue related to the steam cloud, so try to launch the game directly via the KSP_x64.exe and check if the game time is recorded properly on your savegame.

Which version of the game do you play?

On 4/6/2019 at 10:08 PM, 4x4cheesecake said:

Does it happens multiple times, like after every game start? And even though this is the unmodded support forum: Do you run any mods on any KSP install and if so, do you use any mod manager?

I'm a bit confused about the save file though. Maybe an issue related to the steam cloud, so try to launch the game directly via the KSP_x64.exe and check if the game time is recorded properly on your savegame.

Which version of the game do you play?

Newest version with MH. Completely vanilla. It happens after every game start, yes.

@KingDominoIII,

Hi there, i highly suggest to backup your savegame folder and uninstall the game through Steam, reinstall it and first try reloading it without your saved gamestatus.

If it runs, try with your safefile again.

40 minutes ago, Mikki said:

@KingDominoIII,

Hi there, i highly suggest to backup your savegame folder and uninstall the game through Steam, reinstall it and first try reloading it without your saved gamestatus.

If it runs, try with your safefile again.

Just tried. No dice, same issue. Wondering if booting the savefile is what's screwing it up.
